creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: cream colored carton with tan stripes; wooden box with inscription on inside and outside of lid; wrapped in tissue; gold fabric; image of landscape with mountains in distance, rivers and small buildings; small bridge in LR and a lone figure on top of a hill in the center
inscription:
一幅雲煙奪化工　閒來逸奧與誰同　吾家畫訣如拜問　坐在圖書萬卷中
{?}
(A hanging scroll of cloud and mist,
snatching the Creator\'s work!
Serene, I come here:  transcendent mystery—
with whom may I share it?
If someone should inquire about the secrets
of my \"school of painting:\"
Just sit here, in the middle of
ten thousand volumes of books!)
[Jonathan Chaves]
title: Landscape
